subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The 7-foot-2 former star, who led the league in blocks nine times, was the No. 1 draft pick in 1998 and the tallest player in the W.N.B.A.
snippet: The 7-foot-2 former star, who led the league in blocks nine times, was the No. 1 draft pick in 1998 and the tallest player in the W.N.B.A.
